summary: Diff largely implements fixed DA = 8419 in both Manual Entry and Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule modes, including UI messaging that DA is fixed and removal of DA-percentage configuration. However, the changes also appear to make Gross Salary fixed/immutable at 8419, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Gross Salary is enforced as a fixed/immutable value of 8419 across zones/modes (not requested; request only fixed DA).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires DA to be fixed at 8419. Diff introduces constants and state initialization that fix gross salary to 8419 and sets gross salary in auto-calculation effects, implying gross salary can no longer vary.
